channel.title: Steam Greenlight - Cubic Castles
channel.description:
Hello again!
You may or may not know I recently made a topic about the game 'Cubic Castles'. You can find it [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662044.0.html]here[/url]!
After being in open beta for about 17 days, the three developers are trying to get it on steam. But first, greenlight ofcourse!
It'd be awesome if some of you which have a steam-account could just press the thumbs-up button, nothing more than that!
Link to the greenlight page: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=264310623
Thanks in advance :D
